text: And Moses said unto Pharaoh, Glory over me: when shall I intreat for thee, and for thy servants, and for thy people, to destroy the frogs from thee and thy houses, that they may remain in the river only?8.9 Gloryâ€¦: or, Have this honour over me, etc8.9 when: or, against when8.9 to destroy: Heb. to cut off
